about_the_game:
Radiation from 'The War' has left Earth's surface nearly uninhabitable and all but annihilated the global food chain.

Now humanity's last hope for survival lies not underground in bunkers, but under the seas in survivor settlements known as H2OMEs.



You are Cade Callahan, a vulnerable vet of who has been summoned to the ranks of the Rusted Sea Trading Co. - the makeshift entity responsible for shipping provisions to The Staving Survivors.



Inside a crudely repurposed military sub, you embark on your new life under the seas. You are tasked with transporting vital provisions between H20ME colonies while finding food and crafting supplies for your own survival.

Hunt for spoils of war and relics of life before The War. Capture rare and unique species of fish and sealife for extra income. Cook inventive dishes to stay sane while battling relentless loneliness.

short_description: Earth's surface has been dessimated by radiation from The War. The only remaining safe havens are found under the seas. Now you must cook, craft, and survive alone in your submarine, delivering vital supplies to the Starving Survivors - all while battling monsters both real and imagined.
